text:
The SCA contains no CL
requirements. However, if the employer is covered under the FLSA, the FLSA CL
provisions are applicable. (See FLSA 29 C.F.R. Parts 570 and 579; FOH 33.)
html: The SCA contains no CL requirements. However, if the employer is covered under the FLSA, the FLSA CL provisions are applicable. (See FLSA 29 C.F.R. Parts 570 and 579; FOH 33.)
